schemacrawler.schema

Interface Table

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AttributedObject, java.lang.Comparable<NamedObject>, DatabaseObject, DefinedObject, DescribedObject, NamedObject, java.io.Serializable, TypedObject<TableType>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    View

    public interface Table
extends DatabaseObject, TypedObject<TableType>, DefinedObject
    Represents a table in the database.
    Author:
    Sualeh Fatehi

    • Method Detail

      • getColumns

        java.util.List<Column> getColumns()
        Gets the list of columns in ordinal order.
        Returns:
        Columns of the table

      • getExportedForeignKeys

        java.util.Collection<ForeignKey> getExportedForeignKeys()
        Gets the list of exported foreign keys. That is, only those whose primary key is referenced in another table.
        Returns:
        Exported foreign keys of the table.

      • getForeignKeys

        java.util.Collection<ForeignKey> getForeignKeys()
        Gets the list of all foreign keys of the table, including imported and exported foreign keys.
        Returns:
        Foreign keys of the table.

      • getHiddenColumns

        java.util.Collection<Column> getHiddenColumns()
        Gets hidden columns.
        Returns:
        Columns of the table

      • getImportedForeignKeys

        java.util.Collection<ForeignKey> getImportedForeignKeys()
        Gets the list of imported foreign keys. That is, only those that reference a primary key another table.
        Returns:
        Imported foreign keys of the table.

      • getIndexes

        java.util.Collection<Index> getIndexes()
        Gets the list of indexes.
        Returns:
        Indexes of the table.

        Returns:

      • getPrivileges

        Gets the list of privileges.
        Returns:
        Privileges for the table.

      • getRelatedTables

        java.util.Collection<Table> getRelatedTables(TableRelationshipType tableRelationshipType)
        Gets the tables related to this one, based on the specified relationship type. Child tables are those who have a foreign key from this table. Parent tables are those to which this table has a foreign key.
        Parameters:
        tableRelationshipType - Table relationship type
        Returns:
        Related tables.

      • getTableConstraints

        java.util.Collection<TableConstraint> getTableConstraints()
        Gets the constraints for the table.
        Returns:
        Constraints for the table

      • getTableType

        TableType getTableType()
        Gets the table type.
        Returns:
        Table type.

      • getTriggers

        java.util.Collection<Trigger> getTriggers()
        Gets the list of triggers.
        Returns:
        Triggers for the table.

      • hasPrimaryKey

        boolean hasPrimaryKey()
        Checks if the table has a primary key.
        Returns:
        True if the table has a primary key.
